panels.description:
* DQ - Disqualified
* SU - Suspended
* UTD - Up to date

targets.expr: avg(storj_sat_summary{type="onlineScore", job=~"$job.*"} or storj_sat_audit{type="onlineScore", job=~"$job.*", url!="europe-north-1.tardigrade.io:7777", url!="us2.storj.io:7777"}) by(job) * 100

panels.title: Node summary table

targets.expr: avg(storj_sat_summary{type="onlineScore", job=~"$job.*"} or storj_sat_audit{type="onlineScore", job=~"$job.*", url!="us2.storj.io:7777", url!="europe-north-1.tardigrade.io:7777"}) by(url) * 100
